testsuite.name: c2_constraint.(c2) intervention depends on devices states

testcase.classname: c2_constraint.(c2) intervention depends on devices states
testcase.name: Device end its program soon
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario: Device end its program soon Given an AI in syringe pump ... passed in 0.002s When an IoT device is ending its program in less then 30 minutes ... passed in 0.002s Then AI in syringe pump should call healthcare professionals before the end of its program ... passed in 0.012s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------

testcase.classname: c2_constraint.(c2) intervention depends on devices states
testcase.name: Device is in critical state
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario: Device is in critical state Given an AI in syringe pump ... passed in 0.001s When an IoT device is in critical state and ends its program in less then 30 minutes ... passed in 0.001s Then AI in syringe pump should call healthcare professionals right now ... passed in 0.008s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
